Getting Started

Accessing the Dashboard

  • 1 Login to the Hungr Merchant portal with your business credentials.
  • 2 The Live Operations screen is your default workspace.

Section Overview

Navigate via the sidebar to access:

Live Orders Menu Items Analytics Store Settings

Live Operations Board

New Orders

Review all incoming orders. You can decline specific items if they are currently unavailable.

Preparing

Accepted orders move here. Monitor the kitchen timer to ensure on-time fulfillment.

Ready for Pickup

Packed and ready. Notify riders and use the Dispatch Code box to release the order.

Security Protocol

Never hand over items without entering the rider's 6-digit Dispatch Code. This is critical for order tracking.

Menu Management

Catalog Control

Add new items with targeted categories and cuisines. Your cost price helps calculate your net profit metrics.

Stock & Promotions

Update inventory daily using quick-adjust buttons. Apply discounts to specific items to drive traffic.

Analytics & Store Settings

Store Integrity

Keep your store details current. Profile changes may be locked for security once verified.

GPS Requirement

Riders are dispatched based on your exact coordinates. Ensure your GPS location is set correctly in settings.
